title: Studio Museum in Harlem font, by Studio Lin
content:
Hi there,

I need help identifying the attached font.

Some more pictures can be found at the following link, you'll need to locate the project from the image selection however.

[http://www.studiolin.org/projects](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071600/http:/www.studiolin.org/projects "http://www.studiolin.org/projects")

Thanks,

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [StudioLin\_SMH\_Air\_Cover2-1200-xxx.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071600/http:/typophile.com/files/StudioLin_SMH_Air_Cover2-1200-xxx.jpg) | 194.08 KB |
author: AnthonyAnthony

comments.content: Similarities with Design Medium, revived by Steve Jackaman as [Xctasy Sans RR Medium & Alts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071600/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/xctasy-sans-rr/).
